data.text: I lodo di hagawelewele o Dimaadua,
Dimaadua gu oho gi daha nia dama waahale hagalligi huogodoo o Judah,
I lodo dono hagawelewele, gei Mee gu oho nia mahi o Israel.
Mee guu hai gadoo be tadau hagadaumee
Dimaadua gu haga huaidu Israel gadoo be dahi hagadaumee,
Mee gu oho haga ligiligi di Hale Daumaha,
Di Tagi guu huli gi daha mo dono gowaa hai tigidaumaha,
Dimaadua guu hai bolo di abaaba o Zion la gi mooho gi lala.
Nia ngudu di abaaba la gu i hongo di gelegele,
Nia daane mmaadua o Jerusalem guu noho deemuu i hongo di gelegele.
Nia ngogo ogu golomada guu mmae i dogu dangidangi.
Digaula gu hiigai gei gu hieinu, e tangitangi gi nadau dinana.
Go Jerusalem, dogu ihoo hagaaloho Jerusalem,
Au soukohp nadau mee e helekai adu gi di goe ai,
Nia daangada ala e hula taalinga di waahale
O hagadaumee huogodoo e gadagada adu gi di goe
Dimaadua gu haga gila aga ana mee ala ne hiihai bolo e hai.
Jerusalem, dumaalia gi au abaaba gi tangi gi nua gi Tagi,
Goe gii ala haga logo i di boo,
Meenei Dimaadua, Goe e aha dela e hagaduadua gimaadou beenei?
Digau mmaadua mono gau ala e lligi e mmoe mmoe i hongo nia ala.
Goe gu gahi mai ogu hagadaumee bolo gi madagu au i nia baahi huogodoo,
